H0.text: Bradford and Brighton both have a newspaper called what. Courier

H1.text: Bradford and Brighton both have a newspaper called what. Herald

H2.text: Bradford and Brighton both have a newspaper called what. Gazette

H3.text: Bradford and Brighton both have a newspaper called what. Argus

A4.text: The Argus is a local newspaper based in Brighton and Hove in East Sussex, England, with editions serving the city of Brighton and Hove and the other parts of both East Sussex and West Sussex.

A5.text: Founded in 1880, and for many years known as the Evening Argus, the newspaper is owned by Newsquest.
